title: Special traffic plan in Colombo for Gangaramaya Nawam Perahera
content: A special traffic plan has been implemented from 5.00 p.m. today (Feb. 15) in view of the Nawam Maha Perahera of Gangaramaya Temple in Colombo.Road closures: 1. Entrance to James Peiris Road from Piththala Junction 2. Entrance to W.A.D. Ramanayake Mawatha from Hunupitiya Cross Road junction at Dharmapala Mawatha 3. Entrance to Park Street from Park Street junction at Dharmapala Mawatha 4. Entrance to W.A.D. Ramanayake Mawatha and Braybrooke Roundabout from Park Street
